tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (DT This) (NNS things)) (VP (VBP appear) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VP (VB be) (ADJP (JJ true)) (SBAR (CC but) (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP know) (PP (IN for) (ADJP (JJ sure))))))) (NP (PRP$ its) (JJ false))))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [appear/VBP nsubj>[things/NNS det>This/DT] xcomp>[true/JJ mark>to/TO cop>be/VB ccomp>[know/VBP cc>but/CC nsubj>I/PRP advcl:for>[sure/JJ case>for/IN]] dobj>[false/JJ nmod:poss>its/PRP$]]]
